title: Reality Fishing
report: Citation: Anonymous. 'Reality Fishing'. The Entheogen Review. Winter Solstice 1998;7(4):92.

There have been a few times when I smoked Salvia divinorum and was not sure (and still am not sure) that I really returned to the same reality I left from. Funny little details--like all the people I know being acquainted with an advertising cartoon called Charlie the Tuna that I seem to have no recollection of whatsoever. -- Anonymous

erowid.citation: Anonymous. "Reality Fishing: experience with Salvia divinorum (ID 77145)". Erowid.org. Mar 13, 2009. erowid.org/exp/77145
